page.title: 06CHILDREN'S GAMES IN PLOCKTON
page.content: WE PLAY MOSTLY IN OUR{HOUSES}OR IN OUR{GARDENS.}A LOT US LIKE RIDING ON OUR BIKES ON THE PATHS AROUND THE HIGH SCHOOL HOSTEL.THERE ARE NO CARS THERE SO WE ARE QUITE SAFE.WE ALSO PLAY ON THE{SHINTY PITCH.}IT IS THE ONLY LARGE FLAT GRASSY AREA IN THE VILLAGE.THERE ARE SWINGS ON THE{VILLAGE GREEN,}WHERE THE YOUNGER ONES PLAY.WE ALSO PLAY ON THE SHORE,IN THE STREET,IN THE WOODS AT ACHNANDARACH AND AT LOCH LUNDIE. OUR FAVOURITE{OUTDOOR PASTIME}IS RIDING ON BIKES.92% OF CHILDREN HAVE A BIKE.WE ALSO LIKE FOOTBALL AND CHASING GAMES.OUR FAVOURITE{INDOOR GAMES }ARE PLAYING WITH LEGO,DOLLS AND CARS.SOME OF US HAVE HOME COMPUTERS.THE OLDER CHILDREN LIKE READING,LISTENING TO MUSIC AND WE ALL WATCH TELEVISION.WE HAVE TO SPEND A LOT OF TIME INDOORS IN WET WEATHER AND IN WINTER,SO IT IS GOOD TO GET OUT WHEN THE SUN SHINES.
